thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com | 27 of 918
thread.title: Craig

author: Craig
title: Craig
text: No major issues & resolved quickly. For security I disable ALL scripts by default & only allow those necessary for site operation on a source by source basis. The checkout took me to an external site where I had to give temporary permission to some scripts which then loaded more scripts from a different site needing permission. This finished up generating three orders for the same product but only one was charged and the other two were quickly removed by support.
